Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
they have intramural, game shows, and a gym.
Work Hard and stay on top of your assignments and papers. Also if you need help, don't be ashamed to use the tutoring lab for help.
Lander University is a great school to attend and further your education. They have an Excellent faculty and staff, and there to help when needed.

textAfterTable: Here at Lander I find everyday that I am being pushed to my fullest potential. I learn something new everyday that is in my interests. I have picked up great study habits and have learned how to achieve the best grades to benefit my education. Login to rate or flag the reviews LaBrittney from Greenville, SC 07/13/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 7 out of 9 people found this review useful. 2 of 45 Categories Comments Great for these types of students All students that are delicated and willing to learn. Tips for prospective students You have to be open-minded, energetic and ready to learn. It is best to be prepared for your classes, on time, and ready to do the very best job posssible to get ahead.
